description:
doc: improve go_for_cpp_programmers & contribute
1.Added 'Appendix' for C++ programmers mapping concept quickly.
2.Added solution about invalid login of contribute.
I'm not native speaker, help me modify the description to let it clearer.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com, kevlar@google.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg//go

Thanks, but this document is going away.  We will be moving it somewhere
else, or just deleting it.  Feel free to host your own copy of this
elsewhere.

- Brad

On Mon, Feb 27, 2012 at 1:53 PM, <dlin.tw@gmail.com> wrote:

> Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com,
>
> Message:

> kevlar@google.com),

> 1.Added 'Appendix' for C++ programmers mapping concept quickly.

>  M doc/contribute.html
>  M doc/go_for_cpp_programmers.**html
>
>
>

Brad,

Could you open a wiki permission for me to put this document?
http://code.google.com/p/go-wiki/w/list

By the way, I also modify the contribute.html, because there are some people face the same question about check in to codereview page.
